Developpers’ guide¶

We would appreciate any contribution! If you are willing to help, we recommand to follow the following steps before requesting a pull request

  1. Coding conventions: we used the PEP8 style guide for Python Code

  2. Docstrings: we used the numpydoc docstring guide for documenting the functions directly from the docstrings and automatically generating the documentation with sphinx. Please provide codes with up-to-date docstrings.

  3. Documentation build: make sure than the documentation successfully builds by running make html inside the SymJAX/docs repository.

  4. Testing your code: please ensure that your code passes the benchmark tests by running pytest in the repository root.
